content:
<rule id="jaxrs-to-quarkus-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <project><artifact artifactId="jboss-jaxrs-api_2.1_spec" groupId="org.jboss.spec.javax.ws.rs"/></project>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace JAX-RS dependency">
                    <message>
                        Dependency `org.jboss.spec.javax.ws.rs:jboss-jaxrs-api_2.1_spec` has to be replaced with `io.quarkus:quarkus-resteasy-reactive` artifact.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/resteasy-reactive" title="Quarkus - Guide"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
